trustfund: TF020710-SPANISH CONSULTANTS TRUST FUND,TF021412-PHRD-PUBLIC ENTERPRISE REFORM/PRIVATIZATION,TF020625-PHRD-PUBLIC SECTOR REFORM PROJ.

abstracts.cdata!:
The Public Enterprise Reform Loan (PERL)
            will support the Government's efforts to improve
            services and reduce the size of the public sector, under a
            transparent and competitive process, focusing on
            telecommunications, transport, and power. In the
            telecommunications sector the project will prepare and
            diagnose a strategic plan for the restructuring of the
            sector and design a regulatory framework for
            telecommunications and set-up a regulatory entity as well as
            privatize the telecommunications enterprise. In the
            transport sector the project will review and revise the
            Aviation Code to facilitate private sector participation and
            it will audit and privatize the State Aviation Company. The
            project will also implement a new regulatory framework for
            ports, including implementation of the new organization of
            the National Port Entity, develop operational methods and
            procedures for the port, including coordination with private
            operators. In the power sector the project will develop a
            regulatory framework to allow private operators within the
            national power system and establish a regulatory commission
            for power, also the project will study privatization options
            and subsequent implementation strategy for the State Power
            Entity's selected generation plants. The project will
            also provide assistance for reforming the Ministry of
            Agriculture, preparing a diagnosis of the State Petroleum,
            Alcohol and Cement Entity's cement and alcohol plants,
            and peripheral privatizations of public entities such as
            local airports and ambulance services.
